name: Ponorka
description:
In this game, your goal is to deal with barrels full of toxic waste on the sea floor. Use bombs of the bombs and torpedoes to destroy them all before your submarine-bomber hits them!

Note that all in-game texts are in Czech, but don't let that distract you, they are not needed to play the game. Just click on "Nová hra" to start a new game.

We created Ponorka back in 2003 for the Czech freeware game community. We keep it here for people who remember the days and who might have played the game in the past, but we have no plans to update it (or translate to English).

Controls

  • Space = drop a bomb
  • Ctrl = launch a torpedo
  • Escape = back to menu

Credits

Graphics by Peregrine
Code by OndraSej
